articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Sympathy to Lao President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Message of Sympathy to Lao President
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of sympathy to Choummaly Saynasone, President of Laos, in connection with the tropical typhoon that hit Laos recently, claiming huge human and material losses.
					Kim in the message hoped that the president and government of Laos would eradicate the aftermath of the disaster and bring the living of the people in the afflicted area to normal as early as possible.

articles.title: Franklin Graham Here
articles.content:
Franklin Graham Here
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Reverend Franklin Graham of the United States who is president of Samaritan's Purse, a non-governmental organization, and his party arrived here by his plane on Tuesday.
					 At the airport he said that he came to the DPRK to play the role of a bridge for better relations between the United States and the DPRK.

articles.title: Senior Officials Enjoy "Concert in October"
articles.content:
Senior Officials Enjoy "Concert in October"
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The "Concert in October" was given by the Unhasu Orchestra, the Mansudae Art Troupe and the Samjiyon Band at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre Tuesday to celebrate the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					Among the audience were senior party, army and state officials, the chairpersons of friendly parties, officials of party and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, creators, artistes, teachers and students in the field of literature and art and working people in the city.
					
					Put on the stage were mixed chorus "Under the Banner of the Party", chamber concert of the Unhasu Orchestra "Young People, Be Loyal to Our Party", masterpiece "Greeting the Sun Rising over the Taedong River", music presented by the Samjiyon Band, and other colorful numbers.
					
					The performers sang high praises of the feats performed by President Kim Il Sung, the founder and builder of the WPK, and General Secretary Kim Jong Il who has developed it into the eternal party of Kim Il Sung and a guiding force for the Songun revolution.

articles.title: Reception Given by Palestinian Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Palestinian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan gave a reception at his embassy Monday on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there on invitation were Kim Yong Jin, minister of Education, Kim Pyong Phal, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea, Kim Thae Jong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.
					
					 On hand were staff members of the Palestinian embassy.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Inter-Korean Buddhist Mass Held
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Buddhist Mass Held
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- A north-south joint Buddhist mass praying for national reunification was held at Singye Temple in Mt. Kumgang on Tuesday on the occasion of the second anniversary of the restoration of the temple.
					Present at the mass were office-bearers of the Central Committee of the Buddhist Federation of Korea, priests and believers at the temple and priests and believers of Jogye Order from south Korea.
					
					The temple tolled its bell, triple rituals were held and prajna-paramit a-sutra was read out to be followed by speeches.
					
					The speakers said that holding a joint mass at Singye Temple, a symbol of Buddhist temple for reunification, is a manifestation of the will of the Buddhists in the north and the south to invariably preserve and implement the inter-Korean declarations and strengthen solidarity and cooperation between them in the efforts to achieve national reunification.
					
					A joint prayer was released at the mass. It reflected the determination of the Buddhists in the north and the south to pave the way for the tour of Mt. Kumgang and the pilgrimage to Singye Temple and actively turn out in the actions for the country's reunification and peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Polish Embassies Help Korean Farmers
articles.content:
Polish Embassies Help Korean Farmers
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Tomasz Szczepanowski, charge d'affaires ad interim, and other officials of the Polish embassy here did a friendship work at the DPRK-Poland Friendship Jangsuwon Cooperative Farm in Samsok District, Pyongyang, on Tuesday.
					 The guests gave helping hands to the farmers busy with rice harvesting.
					
					 During break they enjoyed an art performance given by kindergarten children and conversed with officials of the farm.
					
					 They handed a vehicle to the farm.

articles.title: Doctor of Literature Conferred on Korean Teacher in China
articles.content:
Doctor of Literature Conferred on Korean Teacher in China
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- DPRK doctorate of literature was awarded to Ri Chung Sil, a Korean teacher of Yanbian University of China, with due ceremony at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
					Ri made a contribution to enriching the history of Korean literature in the middle ages by comprehensively studying, analyzing and systematizing patriotic and progressive poems widely created in Korea from the 17th to 19th centuries.

articles.title: Pothonggang Shop Newly Opened
articles.content:
Pothonggang Shop Newly Opened
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The Pothonggang Shop newly constructed in the heart of Pyongyang is now crowded with citizens.
					The shop is a service center for improving the dietary life of citizens.
					
					Such fragrant merchandise as fresh apple, pear, grape and other fruits line the shelves on the well-arranged first floor.
					
					Conspicuous are fruit sets with various fruits for holiday and birthday.
					
					The counters on the second floor are set out with various kinds of meats and meat products. Among them are more than 10 kinds of pork by-products including stomach, liver, ear, hoof and tail and processed goods such as sausage and ham, as well as meats of duck, goose and turkey.
					
					Each floor of the shop is equipped with all facilities for keeping the commodities fresh.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the shop in August last. Then he said that nothing was more important for the Workers' Party of Korea than to provide more affluent and cultured life to the people, adding that the shop should sell enough fruits and meat products to citizens of the capital so as to permeate the streets of the city with fruit fragrance and to make the streets full of people's happiness.

articles.title: All Party Members Called upon to Exalt Their Honor
articles.content:
All Party Members Called upon to Exalt Their Honor
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- The history of the Workers' Party of Korea shining with victories and glory is a history of worthwhile struggle and feat performed by party members in each generation of the Korean revolution, the comrades of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an editorial article. 
					Calling on all the members of the WPK to eternally exalt their honor, the article goes on:
					
					Whoever is a member of the WPK who has shared intention and destiny with Kim Il Sung and
						Kim Jong Il should carry forward the sacred revolutionary cause started under the leadership of
						Kim Il Sung and accomplish it under the steersmanship of Kim Jong Il without fail, deeply conscious of the noble mission he or she has assumed before the times and history, the country and the people.
					
					The members of the WPK are called comrades of the leader. Herein lie their dignity and honor incomparable with any official post and honorary title.
					
					The members of the WPK are the comrades of the leader closest to him. The leader makes a decision on whatever difficult task, believing in the party members while the latter regard anything intended by the leader as indisputable. This is the relationship based on comradeship existing in the WPK.
					
					The party members are the most valuable comrades of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the ones strong enough to win the whole world.
					
					All the victories of the Korean revolution are those of the party members, the best, noblest and most creative human beings trained by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					The gate to a great prosperous and powerful nation is sure to be opened thanks to the party members.
					
					Unshakable is the faith and will of the party members to acclaim Kim Jong Il on the highest tribune of honor of the times with the historic victory in building a thriving nation and powerfully demonstrate the dignity of the country led by him before the world.
					
					It is the strong will of the party members to become heroes who perform feats by unconditionally carrying out whatever planned and determined by Kim Jong Il.
					
					They believe that the determination of Kim Jong Il represents justice, science and victory. This is the faith of the WPK members and the bottom line of their heroic spirit.

articles.title: WPK Birthday Observed in Bangladesh and France
articles.content:
WPK Birthday Observed in Bangladesh and France
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in Bangladesh and France from Oct. 3 to 5 on the occasion of the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Reports and speeches were made there.
					
					 Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, said that 64 years covered by the WPK founded by President Kim Il Sung are a glorious history in which it has turned the DPRK into a socialist power and led the human cause of independence to shining victory.
					
					 M. Gamrul Huda, chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, noted that the WPK has grown stronger to be a revolutionary party under the wise leadership of General Secretary
						Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Jean Marie Lambret, chief of the French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Idea, referred to the fact that the WPK regarded the Juche idea, founded by Kim Il Sung and developed in depth by Kim Jong Il, as steadfast guidelines and has consistently enforced the politics of love and trust in the people as required by it.
					
					 Messages of greetings to Kim Jong Il were adopted at the seminars sponsored by the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea and the French Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Idea.

articles.title: WPK Birthday Marked in Russia
articles.content:
WPK Birthday Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- Delegations of the Maritime Territorial Regional Branch of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Maritime Territorial Regional Branch of the "United Russia" Party, the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Youth League and the Young Communist League of the Russian Federation paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK consulate general in Nakhodka on Oct. 6 and 7 on the occasion of the 64th birthday of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					The delegations laid floral baskets and bouquets before the full-length picture of President 
						Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il at the consulate general.

articles.title: Songun Revolutionary Comrade
articles.content:
Songun Revolutionary Comrades
Pyongyang, October 13 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il, while sitting together with officials one autumn day of Juche 91 (2002), looked back upon the rigorous days of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					He thoughtfully recollected the day when he had climbed up Mt. Osong on the forefront, saying that the Songun politics was one entirely for the people.
					
					When the whole country was drowned in tears of sorrow after the unexpected demise of the great President Kim Il Sung, those whom he firmly believed were the army and people and their absolute trust in the Party and the leader. Encouraged by this, he overcame the fierce whirlwind of history and natural disasters and frustrated the intensified moves of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK.
					
					The faith that he could surely win because he has such a belief gave inexhaustible courage to him.
					
					That day he said in a resolute tone to the following effect: Victory should be followed by victory. If we are to win a final victory, we have a lot of work to do and should cover a long journey. To greet the day of victory, let us unite firmly around the Party in one mind and one will and discharge our duty with responsibility. I hope that you will always keep in mind the precious title of being revolutionary comrades in the Songun era.
					
					The officials, deeply moved by his teachings, looked up to Kim Jong Il who called the army and people Songun revolutionary comrades sharing the same ideology and will with him.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de consuelo al presidente lao
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia telegrama de consuelo al presidente lao
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 12 un telegrama de consuelo al presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, Choummaly Saynasone, por muchas perdidas humanas y materiales que sufrio recientemente este pais a causa del ciclon tropical.
					En su misiva el remitente desea al destinatario y su gobierno que resarzan las consecuencias del siniestro natural y estabilicen cuanto antes la vida de los habitantes de la zona danada.

articles.title: En Pyongyang Franklin Graham y su comitiva
articles.content:
En Pyongyang Franklin Graham y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ATCC) -- Llegaron este martes a esta capital en el avion privado el pastor estadounidense Franklin Graham, quien es presidente de la organizacion no gubernamental "Samaritan`s Purse", y su comitiva.
					En el aeropuerto el visitante dijo que ha venido aqui para servir de puente por las mejoras relaciones Estados Unidos-Corea.

articles.title: Misa conjunta de budistas coreanos por restauracion de Templo Singye
articles.content:
Misa conjunta de budistas coreanos por restauracion de Templo Singye
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ATCC) -- Con motivo del segundo aniversario de la restauracion del Templo Singye del monte Kumgang, tuvo lugar este martes en ese templo la misa conjunta de los budistas del Norte y el Sur de Corea por la reunificacion de la patria.
					En la ocasion participaron los clerigos del Comite Central de la Federacion de Budistas de Corea, los monjes y creyentes del Templo Singye y de la Orden Budista Jogye del Sur de Corea.
					
					En la misa fueron realizados la campanada por la reunificacion y los triples rituales y dio lectura a prajna-paramit a-sutra y hubo discursos.
					
					Los oradores enfatizaron que la realizacion de la presente ceremonia budista en el Templo Singye, simbolo de instituciones budistas pro-reunificacion, muestra la voluntad de reunificacion de los budistas de ambas partes coreanas de mantener invariablemente y ejecutar las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur y fortalecer la solidaridad y la cooperacion para lograr la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Ultimamente, fue publicada la declaracion conjunta que refleja la determinacion de los budistas de ambas partes coreanas de tomar parte activa en abrir el camino de turismo al monte Kumgang y de peregrinacion al Templo Singye y en la lucha practica por la reunificacion, la paz y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a exaltar el honor del militante del PTC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a exaltar el honor del militante del PTC
Pyongyang, 13 de octubre (ATCC) -- La victoriosa y gloriosa historia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea es la de luchas y meritos preciosos de los camaradas del gran lider y los militantes del PTC de cada generacion de la revolucion.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en el articulo de su Redaccion difundido este martes y continua:
					
					Los militantes del PTC, que comparten el mismo proposito y la vida o muerte con su gran lider y gran dirigente, deberan llevar a feliz termino a toda costa bajo la guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il la sagrada causa revolucionaria, iniciada siguiendo al Presidente Kim Il Sung, bien conscientes de su noble mision asumida ante la epoca, la historia, la patria y el pueblo.
					
					El camarada del lider, he aqui la dignidad y el honor del miembro del PTC que son mas valiosos que cualquier cargo oficial o titulo honorario.
					
					El militante del PTC es el camarada que vive mas cerca del alma de su gran Dirigente.
					
					El lider decide cualquier cosa dificil confiando en los miembros del PTC y estos no la discuten aceptandola como la voluntad de aquel. Esto es el mundo de camaraderia existente en el partido.
					
					Para el Presidente y el Dirigente, los miembros del PTC son los camaradas tan valiosos que no se pueden cambiar ni con un monton de oro y tan fuertes que hacen alcanzar lo todo.
					
					Todas las victorias de la revolucion coreana son las de los militantes del PTC y los humanos mas hermosos, nobles y creativos formados por el gran Presidente y el gran Dirigente.
					
					Gracias a los militantes del PTC, se abriran sin falta las puertas a la gran potencia prospera.
					
					Son invariables la conviccion y la voluntad de ellos de enaltecer a la cima de la epoca al Dirigente Kim Jong Il y glorificar nuestro pais en la palestra mundial como el de este General al alcanzar la historica victoria en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					
					Ser heroes y ameritados que cumplen incondicionalmente todo lo que proyecte y decida el Dirigente, esto es la disposicion de los miembros del PTC de materializar a costa de la vida las indicaciones del Dirigente.
					
					Ellos estan convencidos de que lo decidido por el Dirigente es la justicia, la ciencia y la victoria.  
					
					Esta fe es la fuente fundamental del heroismo de los militantes del PTC.
